Digital Dining for Fast Food
Digital Dining combines the fast food features you need with the flexibility and power of a full featured table service solution. That's because Digital Dining offers a broad, fully integrated solution rather than a narrow specialized product. This is especially important if your operation goes beyond the boundaries of traditional fast food restaurant.
find out more about Digital Dining Supports single, double and triple drive-thru operations Success Story: Chicken King Zoup! Shelby On screen suggestive selling prompts help the cashiers ask the right questions to increase your profit Quick and easy counter service with one-touch cash Compatible with the latest Order Confirmation Displays from Texas Digital Systems Smart combo makes ordering and tracking combination meals a snap Counter display shows last 4 orders to help fill orders correctly Interfaces with the powerful Kitchen Display System from QSR Automations Corporate polling and menu maintenance using the speed and power of the internet, including support for multiple concepts.
